p: The main chemical group identified in Thymus capitatus essential oil was that of monoterpene phenolic compounds (99.37%), with the main representative being carvacrol (76.19%), followed by p-cymene (7.18%) and γ-terpinene (4.9%). It is known that γ-terpinene and the p-cymene are precursors of thymol and its isomeric carvacrol [ 30, 31].
